column4: Description
A global invoice generation tool that created professuinally structured invoices following international best practices, while remaining independent from any specific legal or tax jurisdiction.
A budget planning tool that helps organizations allocate resources across teams projects and categories following financial best practices, with defined budget catefories and time horizons.

Swiss Association Setup: Formation of a Swiss Association with the support of a Swiss licensed counsel. Includes use of templates for founding documents and articles of association, a workshop, and a founding meeting with counsel.
Contract templates: Professionally drafted contract templates for contributor agreements, internal Multisig Agreements, and other operational needs.

VAT documentation for Swiss VAT reporting, ensuring that all relevant invoices, payment records, and transaction classifications are properly maintained to support accurate VAT filings and potential audits by the Swiss Federal Tax Administration (FTA). If the entity is not registered in the Commercial registry, the VAT ID may serve as the company identification number with customers and suppliers.
Structured support for Swiss annual tax compliance and VAT reporting (by default, quarterly), handled by licensed tax professionals, coordinated through our operational framework.
column5:
Annual tax filing
+ VAT reporintg (default: quarterly)

column4: Expense tracking and reimbursement workflows
End to end handling of invoices from submission and approval to accounting and payment.
Reconciliation of transactions, validation of balances and accurate financial records in accounting system for reporting and decicion making.
A report of all expenses incurred during the month, categorized and reviewed to provide visibility into spending and budget performance.
Defined rules governing how expenses are submitted approved and reimbursed.
Operational processes to onboard contributors, manage contracts and payment details.
Crypto-to-Fiat Conversions - 48-hour transfers in USD, GBP, EUR, CHF, DKK. Additional currencies available upon request
Dedicated operational support with an assigned point of contact for handling day-to-day financial and administrative requests.
Operational support across multiple legal entities, with consolidated oversight and cooditated financial workflows.
A dedicated account manager for overseeing the relationship and coordinating ongoing requests.
An informative admin portal providing visibility into billing, active services and key operational documents.
Tailored operational workflows and reporting structures.
Processed invoice
Centralized exchanges such as Kraken, Coinbase, Binance, Bitfinex, Crypto.com, Nexo.
Crypto-friendly banking services serup
Offramps setup
Payroll setup with local Professional Employer Organization providers
Setting up crypto payments for 2nd-party approval based on invoices received
Assitance in coordinating financial information to support external audits.
Additional contributor

For EORs/PEOs to maintain accounts to reduce the risk of getting offboarded
For other suppliers to maintain accounts to reduce the risk of getting offboarded

Conduct regular checks on contractors/clients to monitor for people listed as wanted by authorities, politically exposure(PEP), sanctioned or other relevant information based on databased accessible by our AML tools.
Monitoring connected wallets using an AML tool to do risk assessment and check for connections to illegal and/or suspicious activities
Provide regular compliance reports listing results of the performed AML checks
Assist in preparing documents needed by individuals showing income/affiliation should it be needed in order to secure visas, loans or for other purposes
Monitor incoming invoices for compliance to make sure invoices contain everything needed to be considered compliant with local law prior to payments being made.

Monitor connected accounts to make sure these are topped up
Assist with creating new cards and/or users
Monitor for dubious/restricted transactions such as cash withdrawals, crypto purchases, personal expenses etc.

Employ virtual assistants that can take on roles to assist with ad hoc jobs for the teams/clients.
Take care of withholding taxes, health insurance, bonuses, equipment etc.
Five additional hours of legal advice provided by Swiss counsel.
